docs.text: Welcome to WSD Devops Interview Challenge Case and Scenarios 1: Which ansible command can display all ansible_ configuration for a host. Ans: 2: Please configure a cron job that runs logrotate on all machines every 10 minutes between 2h - 4h.

Welcome to WSD Devops Interview Challenge

docs.text: 1: Which ansible command can display all ansible_ configuration for a host. Ans: 2: Please configure a cron job that runs logrotate on all machines every 10 minutes between 2h - 4h.
